subject: RE: [junit] ant junit performance problem
msgSnippet: ... This isn t easy to answer without knowing more about your Ant script.  Can you post your Ant script?  I d suspect the Ant scripting more than Ant itself.
messageBody:
> From: Daniel Rabe [mailto:drabe@...]
>
> > A full run of our test suite using ant takes about 4 minutes using
> > fork="true". The same test suite run in Intelilj IDEA takes less than
> > a minute. I figured this was because I had fork="true" on the junit
> > task, so I changed it to fork="false". The test execution got
> > marginally slower, and eventually I got an OutOfMemoryError.

This isn't easy to answer without knowing more about your Ant script. Can you post your Ant script? I'd suspect the Ant scripting more than Ant itself.

Scott Stirling
Workscape, Inc.
